channel.description: Recent content in yiffit_net on Lemmy Directory

item.title: Commissions and promotions
item.description: /c/Commissions and promotions on yiffit.net [home] [/c/commissions ðŸŒŽ] [yiffit.net] Description Are you an artist offering commissions? Feel free to advertise yourself here! **You may also use this community to advertise your Patreon, Subscribestar or similar page.** **For sellers:** * NSFW and SFW commission ads allowed * Make sure to flag your post as NSFW if it contains such content. There's no need to flag the post just because it mentions that you offer such a type of commission

item.title: Furry Vore
item.description: /c/Furry Vore on yiffit.net [home] [/c/furryvore ðŸŒŽ] [yiffit.net] Description A community for Furry Vorarephiliacs to share any type of Vore media, or simply to ask any questions relating to this ravenous kink. Exclusively for feral & anthro vore and anything inbetween. Rules: #1. This is an 18+ community. You must be over the age of 18 to participate here. #2. Absolutely NO under 18 characters. This includes characters who are above 18 but bear substantially neotenic features (10,000 year old vampire who looks 17 is no bueno).

item.title: Furry memes
item.description: /c/Furry memes on yiffit.net [home] [/c/memes ðŸŒŽ] [yiffit.net] Description Community dedicated to furry memes - Minors DNI, even if content is SFW - List sources (sauce) in the comments - Make sure to flag any NSFW posts as such - No underage characters - Don't post artwork from artists in the DNP list Details Activity Count Subscribers 140 Posts 25 Comments 48 Daily Active Users 5 Weekly Active Users 22 Monthly Active Users 22 Activity Date Published 2023-06-09 00:07:24 Updated 2023-06-15 17:32:09 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:11

item.description: /c/Furry Chat on yiffit.net [home] [/c/chat ðŸŒŽ] [yiffit.net] Description Yiffit chat! Mention @chat@yiffit.net from your favorite Fediverse / Mastodon client to post here directly, or post directly via any Lemmy instance. Details Activity Count Subscribers 126 Posts 27 Comments 149 Daily Active Users 14 Weekly Active Users 55 Monthly Active Users 55 Activity Date Published 2023-06-08 17:32:47 Updated 2023-06-15 17:26:44 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:11

item.title: Furry (Safe For Work)
item.description: /c/Furry (Safe For Work) on yiffit.net [home] [/c/furry ðŸŒŽ] [yiffit.net] Description Community dedicated to SFW furry artwork - All content must be Safe for Work. Neither explicit nor questionable content is allowed in this community. - All titles for non-original artwork must include attribution - If you post from a lemmy instance, please include a link to the artist's profile, gallery or social media in the body of the post.

It does, however, support discussion around mature topics which should be flagged as NSFW.
